title: Here's my question, Riot.
body:
Why is it that when I get the Skip Waiting For Stats bug, I'm not awarded a chest, a key fragment, or even a grade?

I took part in the game. It shows up in match history. So why is this happening?

(Put it in bugs since I don't think this is intended client behaviour.)

replies.body: Thanks for the post! I'm mostly commenting here so that it gets noticed :D.
This happens to me too all the time, its really frustrating because I've missed out on countless things over time.

For some reason the Grade doesn't always shows up in match history, even when you don't skip results. I never get key fragments after a game (maybe we used to?). If you didn't get an S- or higher how would you receive a chest? And how would you know if your grade doesn't show up in match history?

> [{quoted}](name=HommeGoujon,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=y8LnuETM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-12T13:22:25.164+0000)
>
> For some reason the Grade doesn't always shows up in match history, even when you don't skip results. I never get key fragments after a game (maybe we used to?). If you didn't get an S- or higher how would you receive a chest? And how would you know if your grade doesn't show up in match history?

I've noticed that if you don't hover over your icon to see the grade, you wont see it in your history.
Is that so? I think the moment I noticed it is when I had the message you got a S or whatever with your champ so I didnt bother checking the grade I guess. I'll try it out next time I play. Thanks!
